definitions.definition: a soft yellow food made from cream, used in cooking and for spreading on bread

Rub the butter into the flour.
The butter melted in the heat.
This butter doesn't spread very well.

definitions.definition: used to say that somebody seems to be innocent, kind, etc. when they are not really

wordOrigin: Old English butere, of West Germanic origin; related to Dutch boter and German Butter, based on Latin butyrum, from Greek bouturon.
